why: A conflict arises when two separate branches have made edits to the same line in a file, or when a file has been deleted in one branch but edited in the other
solution: add to staging with (git add .) then git commit without the -m flag after removing the conflict comment. While in the Vim editor type [:wq]

tip: When you make any change in any branch ensure you stage the changes (git add .) then commit them (git commit -m 'comment')
